entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Barry's Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 04:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: -3.6°C
Wind: W 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning then light late this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow beginning early in the afternoon. Snow with ice pellets in the afternoon and with freezing rain late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
